title:
Rigorous results for mean first-passage time of harmonically trapped
  particle
abstract:
The Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process of diffusion in the harmonic potential is
re-examined in the context of the first-passage time problem. We investigate
this problem to the extent that it has not yet been fully resolved and
demonstrate exact novel results. They mainly concern the mean first-passage
time for a particle diffusing downward and upward the harmonic potential. We
verify the obtained results using a number of analytical techniques.
